price: Sọ pé: “Olúwa mi, mò ń sádi Ọ́ níbi ròyíròyí t’àwọn èṣù.
arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنۡ هَمَزَٰتِ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waqul rabbi aʿūdhu bika min hamazāti al-shayāṭīni
